body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     People               People        Abercrombie    Â   There is a wide range of people who have lived in and around what is now known as Wrangell-St. Elias National Park and Preserve. We invite you to explore the people who have explored this area and who have made this place their home. Lt. Henry Allen Expedition (pdf format, 1.62 MB)      Alaska's Lewis and Clark - learn about the government expedition to explore the Wrangell Mountains.
